text: There were loud cries of 'shame' from all parts of the Conservative side. Mr. Fell appeared to be in tears as he sat down. A few minutes later, Mr. Fell got up and left the chamber. He returned five minutes later to stand just inside the doorway looking more composed. In the middle of the amazing scene, Mr. Macmillan waved his hand at Mr. Fell.
handwritten_text: There were loud cries of 'shame' from all parts of the Conservative side. Mr. Fell appeared to be in tears as he sat down. A few minutes later, Mr. Fell got up and left the chamber. He returned five minutes later to stand just inside the doorway looking more composed. In the middle of the amazing scene, Mr. Macmillan waved his hand at Mr. Fell.
